ReadMe for pdfcat
=================

Overview
--------

This package provides library to concatenate PDF files.


Dependencies
------------

* pdflatex 

Authors
-------

:atReal Team - contac@atreal.net :
    * Jean-Nicolas Bes [drjnut]
    * Matthias Broquet [tiazma]


Credits
